actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A resolution to express the intent of Congress to restore funds for certain youth programs and countercyclical public service employment programs under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act which would be cut by the President's budget.

summary.text: Expresses the intent of Congress to restore, for specified youth programs and countercyclical public service employment programs under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act, funds which would be cut by the President's budget.

titles.title: A resolution to express the intent of Congress to restore funds for certain youth programs and countercyclical public service employment programs under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act which would be cut by the President's budget.
